code: const cart=[];const handleCart=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:cart;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;const product=action.payload;switch(action.type){case"ADDITEM":const exist=state.find(x=>x.id===product.id);if(exist){return state.map(x=>x.id===product.id?{...x,qty:x.qty+1}:x);}else{const product=action.payload;return[...state,{...product,qty:1}];}break;case"DELITEM":const exist1=state.find(x=>x.id===product.id);if(exist1.qty===1){return state.filter(x=>x.id!==exist1.id);}else{return state.map(x=>x.id===product.id?{...x,qty:x.qty-1}:x);}break;case"DELITEMS":return state=state.filter(x=>{return x.id!==action.payload.id;});break;case"CLEARCART":return state=state.filter(x=>{return"";});break;default:return state;break;}};export default handleCart;
